headline.main: THOUSANDS HELD IN BRAZIL'S DRIVE TO ROOT OUT REDS

byline.original: By EDWARD C. BURKS; Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: leaders demand purge of Cong; Castelo Branco election as Pres seen certain; he tells crowd Communists must be wiped out; Brizola sought; Goulart mil aide Gen Brasil arrested on arrival from Uruguay; police rept capture of proof that Chinese...
docs.lead_paragraph: leaders demand purge of Cong; Castelo Branco election as Pres seen certain; he tells crowd Communists must be wiped out; Brizola sought; Goulart mil aide Gen Brasil arrested on arrival from Uruguay; police rept capture of proof that Chinese Communists bribed Brazilians for infiltration; Kubitschek attacked for reptd intercession in arrest of Jurema; Lacerda-controlled newspaper demands expropriation of Kubitschek and Goulart property; Kubitschek pleads for respect for personal liberty without vengeance
docs.abstract: leaders demand purge of Cong; Castelo Branco election as Pres seen certain; he tells crowd Communists must be wiped out; Brizola sought; Goulart mil aide Gen Brasil arrested on arrival from Uruguay; police rept capture of proof that Chinese Communists bribed Brazilians for infiltration; Kubitschek attacked for reptd intercession in arrest of Jurema; Lacerda-controlled newspaper demands expropriation of Kubitschek and Goulart property; Kubitschek pleads for respect for personal liberty without vengeance
